title: Sound On: Infrastructure Snag, Vaccine Mandate
itunes:title: Sound On: Infrastructure Snag, Vaccine Mandate
description:
Guests: Democratic California Congressman John Garamendi, Bloomberg Government reporter Jack Fitzpatrick, Marc Goldwein, Senior Policy Director for the Committee for a Responsible Federal Budget, and Bloomberg Politics contributors Rick Davis and Jeanne Sheehan Zaino.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
